alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:11PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hinds and southwestern Madison Counties through 845 PM CST... At 811 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brownsville, or near Clinton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Flora and Pocahontas around 825 PM CST. Annandale around 835 PM CST. Gluckstadt around 840 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central Mississippi.
